mapper.select: SELECT A.CAT_NAME AS CAT_NAME , CS.SEX AS CAT_SEX , A.CAT_AGE AS CAT_AGE , AD.SI AS SI , AD.GU AS GU , AD.DONG AS DONG , AP.ADT_PROC AS ADT_PROC , AT.ADT_TYPE AS ADT_TYPE , A.HIT_COUNT AS HIT_COUNT FROM ADT_REG A JOIN CAT_SEX CS ON A.CAT_SEX = CS.SEX_CODE JOIN ADDRESS AD ON A.CAT_ADDRESS = AD.ADDRESS_CODE JOIN ADT_PROCESS AP ON A.ADT_PROC_CODE = AP.ADT_PROC_CODE JOIN ADT_TYPE AT ON A.ADT_TYPE = AT.ADT_TYPE_CODE ORDER BY A.POST_DATE
